entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Antigonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
